Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at B:CONTE Asakusa in Tokyo (Asakusa), you'll be minutes from Asakusa Little Theater and Sensoji Temple. This hotel is within close proximity of Asakusa Public Hall and Dempoin Temple.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with full-sized refrigerators/freezers and stovetops. LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access keeps you connected. Conveniences include phones, as well as safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Make use of convenient amenities, which include complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include complimentary high-speed (wired) Internet access, complimentary newspapers in the lobby, and dry cleaning/laundry services.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.

With a stay at B:CONTE Asakusa in Tokyo (Asakusa), you'll be minutes from Asakusa Little Theater and Sensoji Temple. This hotel is within close proximity of Asakusa Public Hall and Dempoin Temple.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Asakusa Public Hall - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi
Dempoin Temple - 0.1 km / 0.1 mi

Kaminarimon - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Asakusa Shrine - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi
Asakusa Culture Tourist Information Center - 0.3 km / 0.2 mi

The nearest airports are:
Tokyo (HND-Haneda) - 18.2 km / 11.3 mi
Tokyo (NRT-Narita Intl.) - 54.1 km / 33.6 mi

The preferred airport for B:CONTE Asakusa is Tokyo (NRT-Narita Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • No onsite parking is available.
